Package org.webcurator.core.report.parameter

Interface Summary
Parameter Generic parameter for a report.
 

Class Summary
AgencyParameter Parameter for Agencies

When rendered as a HTML input, it is displayed as a SELECT filled with agencies names, with also the option to select 'All agencies'.
DateParameter Parameter representing a Date.

The date format is by default set to European format dd/MM/yyyy.
ListParameter Parameter for a list of elements.

When rendered as a HTML input, it is displayed as a SELECT filled with element names.
ParameterEditor Property editor for Parameter,
ParameterFactory Utility method for building a Parameter from properties found in the ReportCommand.
ReportCommandParsing Utility class containing the algorithm for parsing a ReportCommand.

Used for building Parameters as well as for validating each Parameter.
SimpleErrors Dummy implementation of Errors

The methods that can be used from this implementation are only:

The default constructor: SimpleErrors()
The methods: reject(xxx), hasErrors()
StringParameter Parameter representing a Texfield input
TargetTypeParameter Parameter for Target Types

When rendered as a HTML input, it is displayed as a SELECT filled with target type names, with also the option to select 'All'.

As all other ListParameter parameters, the option selected is then seen as a StringParameter.
UserParameter Parameter for Users

When rendered as a HTML input, it is displayed as a SELECT filled with users names, with also the option to select 'All users'.

As all other ListParameter parameters, the option selected is then seen as a StringParameter.
